articles.author: Olesya Dmitracova, Anna Cooban, Juliana Liu, Michael Nam
articles.title: McDonald’s stores hit by global IT failure - CNN
articles.description: McDonald’s has been hit by a system failure that closed stores and disrupted online and app orders in countries as far apart as the United States, Australia, Japan, Hong Kong and the United Kingdom.
articles.content:
London/Hong Kong/New YorkCNN
  — 
McDonalds has been hit by a system failure that closed stores and disrupted online and apporders around the world, including in the United States,Australia, Japan,… [+2126 chars]
